CHAT.comment: HOLLY WOOD, Petitioner v. RICHARD F. ALLEN, COMMISSIONER, ALABAMA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KERRY A. SCANLON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF COREY L. MAZE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KERRY A. SCANLON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:04 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
